alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing non-metal as well as metal atoms but not belonging to afore mentioned classes.
alternative_parents.name: Miscellaneous mixed metal/non-metals

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing phosphorus with a less electronegative element or elements.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic phosphides

class.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a post-transition metal.
class.name: Post-transition metal salts

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as post-transition metal salts. These are inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a post-transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a post-transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Post-transition metal salts

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
